metadata.name: HackTool - Dumpert Process Dumper Execution
metadata.comment: Detects the use of Dumpert process dumper, which dumps the lsass.exe process memory

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND contains(lower(process.file.hashes.value), lower('09d278f9de118ef09163c6140255c690')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('dumpert.dll')))

output.summary: Detects the use of Dumpert process dumper, which dumps the lsass.exe process memory

metadata.objective: False positive: Very unlikely References: https://github.com/outflanknl/Dumpert, https://unit42.paloaltonetworks.com/actors-still-exploiting-sharepoint-vulnerability/
